entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
